name: Sparksupport.com
overview: Sparksupport is a managed services provider with capabilities in IT infrastructure management for SMBs & server administration. We have expertise in application and web hosting support. What distinguishes us is the expertise in various cloud / grid computing solutions and our unique positioning in the IaaS offerings with Migrate2Cloud. We have expertise in cloud computing solutions like 3Tera Applogic, Parallels Virtuzzo clusters, VMOps & Eucaplytus. We have a team of engineers focusing on e-mail deliverability with solid expertise on Cisco Ironport, MessageSystems (ecelerity), PowerMTA & Postfix based solutions. With years of experience in serving Data centers and end users in the hosting industry our engineers are equipped with cPanel, Plesk based hosting servers and well seasoned to address the issues arising in infrastructure support.
